features.name: Media Query Evaluation
features.description: Evaluates a specified CSS media query string and determines whether it matches the current browser state.

features.name: Dynamic State Management
features.description: Keeps a boolean state that dynamically updates based on whether the media query matches.

features.name: Responsive UI Support
features.description: Allows developers to adapt the UI and behavior of components based on the media query's evaluation.

features.name: Event Listener Management
features.description: Registers and deregisters event listeners for media query changes automatically, ensuring efficient resource usage.

features.name: Memory Safety
features.description: Cleans up event listeners when the component unmounts, preventing memory leaks.

props.name: value
props.description: The media query string to evaluate, e.g., '(max-width: 768px)'.
